titles.title: Jesus My Lord,My God My all

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus My Lord,My God My all

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
1.Jesus My Lord,My God My all
How can i love thee as i ought

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And how revere this wondrous gift
so far surpassing hope or thought

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Sweet sacrament we thee adore
Oh Make us love thee more and more
Oh Make us love thee more and more

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
2.Had i but Mary's sinles heart
too love thee with thy dearest king

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Oh with what bursts of fervent praise
thy goodness Jesus would i sing

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
3.Ah see'within a creatures hand,
the vast creator deigns to be

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Reposing infant like as though
On Joseph's arm or Mary's knee

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
4.Thy body soul and Godhead all
oh mystery of live divine

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
I can not compass all i have
For all thou hast and art mine

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
5.Sound sound his praises higher still
and come ye angels to our aid

verse.name: v12
verse.lines:
Tis God tis God the very God
Whose power both man and angels made
